Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at LaSalle
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue  Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue  Line trains are standing at LaSalle due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd Street Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island: due to Line Cut, near 63rd Street Beach.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Stony Island: due to Line Cut, near 63rd Street Beach.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
